programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o oscil3.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kamp = .6 kcps = 440 ifn = p4
asig oscil kamp, kcps, ifn outs asig,asig
endin
instr 2
kamp = .6 kcps = 440 ifn = p4
asig oscil3 kamp, kcps, ifn outs asig,asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 128 10 1 ; Sine with a small amount of data f2 0 128 10 1 0.5 0.3 0.25 0.2 0.167 0.14 0.125 .111 ; Sawtooth with a small amount of data f3 0 128 10 1 0 0.3 0 0.2 0 0.14 0 .111 ; Square with a small amount of data f4 0 128 10 1 1 1 1 0.7 0.5 0.3 0.1 ; Pulse with a small amount of data
i 1 0 2 1 i 2 3 2 1 i 1 6 2 2 i 2 9 2 2 i 1 12 2 3 i 2 15 2 3 i 1 18 2 4 i 2 21 2 4
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
